The '''Dominican Republic men's national under-17, under-18 and under-19 basketball team' is a national basketball team of the Dominican Republic, administered by the Federaci√≥n Dominicana de Baloncesto. It represents the country in international under-17, under-18 and under-19 basketball competitions.
